message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties if you were to acquire this item. We're offering it to you for $1350000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think we can do better than $1350000. What do you think?

Thank you for your response, Bob. While we appreciate your offer, we would like to counter with a proposal of $1400000 for the product. We believe this offers a fair compromise between our values. Please let us know if this meets your expectations.

I understand your proposal, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $1300000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it brings to me. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of your proposal, we would like to counter with an offer of $1350000 for the product. We believe this reflects a fair compromise while also allowing us to maintain a positive relationship with you. Please let us know if this meets your requirements.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $1250000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it brings to me. What do you think?

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. We understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In response, we propose a final offer of $1300000 for the product. This price reflects a reasonable compromise that allows us to maintain a profitable transaction while respecting your budget constraints. We hope this meets your expectations and look forward to your response.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $1275000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it brings to me. What do you think?

Thank you for your continued engagement, Bob. We've carefully considered your latest offer and are pleased to counter with a final offer of $1287500 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise that respects both our interests and maintains a positive business relationship. We hope this meets your expectations and look forward to your response.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I've gone as low as I can, so I'm afraid I'll have to reject your offer. I think it's time for me to explore other options. I'll consider buying the product from John for $1500000.
